I am Steve Knee, husband, father, Derbyshire Business Leader and strong local Conservative.
As a business leader I employee over 100 people across sites in Derbyshire and Scotland. Having established my business nearly 25 years ago, I am now heavily involved in politics with a view to a future full time political career.
As a strong Conservative, I am a member of the Conservative Approved Parliamentary Candidate List, which is a pre-requisite to being able to apply to stand in a Parliamentary seat for the Conservative Party. I also represent my local area as a Councillor on Duffield Parish Council and I am an enthusiastic member of the Conservative Environment Network.
Please do not hesitate to contact me on any local or national issue that you think I can be of help with.
